import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient ,HttpHeaders} from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-manager-projects', templateUrl: './manager-projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./manager-projects.component.css'] }) export class ManagerProjectsComponent implements OnInit{ projects: any[] = []; // Populate this array with your project data selectedProject: any; constructor(private http : HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.projects = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('projectkey')); } selectProject(project: any) { this.selectedProject = project; } }
